sentences.en: But even the EU's embrace of IFRS has been less than effusive.
sentences.cn: 不过欧洲接纳ifrs的过程也非一帆风顺.

sentences.en: Every visitor noticed that her effusive welcome was not sincere.
sentences.cn: 所有的客人都看出来她那过分热情的欢迎是不真诚的.

sentences.en: He had not been effusive when he was brought in to see Thomas.
sentences.cn: 当他被带去见托马斯时,并没大动感情.

sentences.en: He was effusive in his praise for the general.
sentences.cn: 他对那位将军极尽溢美之词。

sentences.en: He was effusive in his praise.
Her effusive manner of greeting her friends finally began to irritate them.
sentences.cn: 她向朋友们打招呼时那种过于热情的方式到头来使他们感到不是滋味.
她道谢时非常激动,弄得大家不好意思.

sentences.en: Her effusive welcome made us feel most uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 她热情地款待,使得我们非常不自在.

sentences.en: His manner not effusive , It'seldom was; but he was glad, I think, to see me.
sentences.cn: 他的态度不很热情, 这种情况是少见的, 但是我认为他看到我时还是高兴的.

sentences.en: Husbands are effusive, heartfelt , and articulate in their appreciation of both their partners and their marriages.
sentences.cn: 男人在对待他们的伴侣和婚姻时是充满温情的, 体贴的并且善于表达自己.

sentences.en: I asked, hospitable still, but not exactly effusive.
sentences.cn: 我依然殷勤地问道, 但已不是那么曲意逢迎了.

sentences.en: Marked by effusive and insincere flattery.
sentences.cn: 她那过分热情的欢迎是不真诚的.

sentences.en: Our host gave us an effusive welcome.
She was very gushing and very effusive.
The nose offers effusive aromas of crushed berries.
sentences.cn: 香气中流露出压榨浆果的清香.

sentences.en: Those hot and humid, effusive days.
sentences.cn: 那些炎热和潮湿, 热情洋溢的天.

trans.tran_cn: 流露感情的，溢于言表的，流出的，喷出的
trans.tran_en: showing your good feelings in a very excited way
